name: Overdosed - A Trip To Hell
description: Take an experimental form of LSD and battle against hordes of nightmarish hallucinations in randomly generated roguelike adventures and arena style levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista (SP2) Processor: 2GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX10 compliant card with 1GB of VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Laptops aren't really recommended for this game (unless it's a gaming laptop). The game uses modern features from Unreal Engine 4. Hardware older than 5 years may struggle.
